Title: Arthur 3: The War of the Two Worlds
Writer: Luc Besson, Céline Garcia, Patrice Garcia (characters and universe)
Actors: Mia Farrow, Ron Crawford, Robert Stanton, Penny Balfour
Plot: With Maltazard now seven feet tall and Arthur still two inches small, our hero must find a way to grow back to his normal size and stop the Evil M once and for all, with the help of Selenia and Betameche.
